#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ #vacancy #design #senior

Vacancy: Senior Product Designer (Full-time)
Location: Belarus, Minsk (work remotely, but always welcomed to the office)
Salary range: 2100-2500$ (netto)

üöÄ Spatium is a global player in crafting web3 products and advancing blockchain technology.
Today, Spatium is VC backed company generating revenue, with 30+ great open-minded persons in the team who carefully craft high quality crypto products. Currently, Spatium‚Äôs mission is to scale Bitcoin, connect it with the other blockchains, remove web3 adoption barriers for end-users. To accomplish our mission and make the vision real, we launched a new product ‚Äî our own B2C crypto wallet.

Requirements:
‚ñ™Ô∏è3+ years of experience in designing complex products, mainly (but not limited to) mobile apps in fintech domain
‚ñ™Ô∏èEnglish (B1 or higher)
‚ñ™Ô∏èStrong design skills across iOS, Android and web
‚ñ™Ô∏èPassion for design and solving complex UX and UI challenges
‚ñ™Ô∏èStrong attention to details
‚ñ™Ô∏èA portfolio showing excellent product design work
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience with building and refactoring design systems
‚ñ™Ô∏èStrong UX focus
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience in conducting UX researches, running usability and guerrilla tests, analyze received data and make respective design decisions
‚ñ™Ô∏èGreat visual, UI skills, and taste
‚ñ™Ô∏èFluency in Figma
‚ñ™Ô∏èDesign thinking as well as the ability to think from strategic product perspective
‚ñ™Ô∏èGreat communication skills
‚ñ™Ô∏èThe ability to clearly express ideas and articulate design decisions
‚ñ™Ô∏èThe ability to work across different teams, including engineers, QA and other stakeholders
‚ñ™Ô∏èThe ability to take full ownership and responsibility for design process and results
‚ñ™Ô∏èThe ability to work in fast-paced startup and crypto environment
‚ñ™Ô∏èYou should be a constant learner

Nice to have:
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience in creation crypto or fintech products
‚ñ™Ô∏èYou are excited to learn about and live crypto
‚ñ™Ô∏èYou are active user of crypto products
‚ñ™Ô∏èYou can create clean, clear and beautiful presentations
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience in motion design
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience in designing and maintaining cross-platform design systems

What you‚Äôll do:
‚ñ™Ô∏èContribute to overall strategy and decision-making about product direction
‚ñ™Ô∏èWork on new features for our mobile crypto wallet
‚ñ™Ô∏èImprove UX and UI of Spatium crypto wallet
‚ñ™Ô∏èRefactoring and support of our design system
‚ñ™Ô∏èCome up with features and improvements that ship quickly and with high-quality
‚ñ™Ô∏èConduct researches, usability and guerrilla testing, analyze data
‚ñ™Ô∏èLead end-to-end design process and work closely with engineers and other stakeholders to ensure a high-quality implementation
‚ñ™Ô∏èWork on Spatium marketing website
‚ñ™Ô∏èCreate marketing visuals

What we offer:
‚ñ™Ô∏èContribute to revolutionary product in in fast developing crypto industry
‚ñ™Ô∏èChallenging work in quickly developing web3 domain
‚ñ™Ô∏èWork-life balance
‚ñ™Ô∏èCompetitive salary
‚ñ™Ô∏èCoffee during workdays
‚ñ™Ô∏èRegular team events and off-sites

‚úçÔ∏è Please send your CV and portfolio to HR @Helen_Zalesskaya

#whois #–ø–æ—Ä—Ç—Ñ–æ–ª–∏–æ #–∏—â—É_—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É

Hello, I am Oleksandr.

I work with a variety of projects, ranging in complexity and artistic direction, both for B2B and B2C products. Currently, I am working on an ERP system for a fintech UK insurance company. This involves lots of analytical work, technical cooperation with developers, and maintaining the system design for almost 90 components. 

It would be my pleasure to help you achieve your company goals part time or on site (I'm open for opportunities).

I'm all about curiosity and making things happen. I love tackling challenges and bringing ideas to life. Let's have a chat and explore how we can create something beautiful and impactful together üôÇ
